## Učitavanje podataka
```{r}
C.data <- read.table("zad57r.dat", header = TRUE, sep = " ")
C.data <- data.frame(C.data)

X <- C.data$x
Y <- C.data$y
Z <- C.data$z
```

## (a) Prikaz podataka u Kartezijevom koordinatnom sustavu.
```{r}
plot(C.data$x, C.data$z)
plot(C.data$y, C.data$z)
plot(C.data$x, C.data$y)
library(rgl)
plot3d(C.data)
```
